comment: /**  * Resolve the given destination name and receive a message from it.  * @param destinationName the destination name to resolve  */
code: /**  * Resolve the given destination name and receive a message from it.  * @param destinationName the destination name to resolve  */ @Nullable Message<?> receive(String destinationName) throws MessagingException.

comment: /**  * Resolve the given destination name, receive a message from it,  * convert the payload to the specified target type.  * @param destinationName the destination name to resolve  * @param targetClass the target class for the converted payload  */
code: /**  * Resolve the given destination name, receive a message from it,  * convert the payload to the specified target type.  * @param destinationName the destination name to resolve  * @param targetClass the target class for the converted payload  */ @Nullable <T> T receiveAndConvert(String destinationName, Class<T> targetClass) throws MessagingException.
